Literature.Title: Effects of lysine-to-arginine substitution on antimicrobial activity of cationic stapled heptapeptides.
Literature.Author: Luong HX, Kim DH, Lee BJ, Kim YW

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:5.6% Hemolysis=50 µM,Human erythrocytes:1.8% Hemolysis=25 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=6.3µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538P(MIC=3.2µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=12.5µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=12.5µM),Shigella dysenteriae ATCC 9752(MIC=25µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=50µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 10031(MIC=18.8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=37.5µM)
